p: Moisture, pH and electrical conductivity were measured following the International Honey Commission method [ 29]. Moisture content was recorded using a Refracto 30GS refractometer (Mettler Toledo, Port Melbourne, VIC, Australia) and converted following a Chetaway table. pH value was measured from 10% honey solutions. Electrical conductivity was measured from 20% honey solutions ( w/ v) using a S230 conductivity meter (Mettler Toledo, Port Melbourne, Australia).
